description: West Ham 3-2 Fulham: Did you know?
title: West Ham 3-2 Fulham: Did you know?
title_page: West Ham 3-2 Fulham: Did you know? - BBC Sport
maintext: Graham Potter has become the first West Ham manager to win his first ever home Premier League game in charge of the Hammers since Sam Allardyce in August 2012 vs Aston Villa (1-0).
